content.rendered:
2019 British Open at Royal Portrush’s Dunluce Links

The 2019 Open Championship will play out on Royal Portrush’s Dunluce Links, a stunning course with incredible views of Northern Ireland’s coast. The scenery is stunning and so is the course itself. It is known as one of the best and most challenging in the country, and the only one in Northern Ireland to have hosted the British Open. The rugged rough, numerous elevation changes, demanding greens and unpredictable weather all add to the difficulty of the course. It will make for a tough test for even the most seasoned pros, and some fascinating viewing for golf fans.
